pullrequest.title: make irobot hand publish joint transforms

content.raw: This piece of the launch (nodes of robot_state_publisher) is exactly the same than in [atlas_irobot_hands_bringup.launch](#!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/431/make-irobot-hand-publish-joint-transforms/diff#Ldrcsim_gazebo/launch/atlas_irobot_hands_bringup.launchT2), right? If this is the case, I would prefer to use a common file, you can find the changes in ```update_irobot_hand_issue_139_jrivero``` branch.
content.html: This piece of the launch (nodes of robot_state_publisher) is exactly the same than in atlas_irobot_hands_bringup.launch, right? If this is the case, I would prefer to use a common file, you can find the changes in update_irobot_hand_issue_139_jrivero branch.
